title: Inside Blake Masters' Debate Night Beatdown of Mark Kelly with Blake Masters and Tyler Bowyer
itunes:title: Inside Blake Masters' Debate Night Beatdown of Mark Kelly with Blake Masters and Tyler Bowyer
description:
With ballots being sent out in Arizona in five days, Charlie has COO of Turning Point Action, Tyler Bowyer, on the show to give the lay of the land, from door knocking, the latest polls, and the RNC's refusal to go all in on one of the biggest senate pickup opportunities in the country. They are joined by the man himself, Trump-endorsed candidate for US Senate from Arizona, Blake Masters, fresh off an incredible debate performance with his opponent, Mark Kelly, where Blake proved to Arizona voters why he deserves their vote. Blake unpacks some of Mark Kelly’s most ignorant answers, and shows once again why Kelly is nothing but a Schummer and Biden puppet betraying the values of Arizona voters.

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
